Quote.Author: Dave Foley
Quote.QuoteValue: NBC is working with a team of astrophysicists to create a new day of the week

Quote.Author: Dave Foley
Quote.QuoteValue: Stand-up comedy and poverty. Those were my two main endeavors

Quote.Author: Dave Foley
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something about strip malls that just reeks of my childhood

Quote.Author: Dave Foley
Quote.QuoteValue: Canadians still spend so much time discussing what it means to be Canadian

Quote.Author: Dave Foley
Quote.QuoteValue: The important thing to remember is that bugs don't actually talk

Quote.Author: Dave Foley
Quote.QuoteValue: 'High Stakes' was a very bad movie that I was cast in as a lead

Quote.Author: Dave Foley
Quote.QuoteValue: David Steinberg was the reason the Smothers Brothers got cancelled

Quote.Author: Dave Foley
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in the suburbs of Toronto, where everything was in a strip mall

Quote.Author: Dave Foley
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, 'Kids In The Hall' is the reason I have any career at all

Quote.Author: Dave Foley
Quote.QuoteValue: I still do miss the freedom to play any kind of character I wanted to play

Quote.Author: David Antin
Quote.QuoteValue: Stories are different every time you tell them - they allow so many possible narratives

Quote.Author: David Antin
Quote.QuoteValue: My way of thinking is very particular and concrete. It doesn't follow a continuous path

Quote.Author: David Antin
Quote.QuoteValue: I am quite unsatisfied by the distinctions between the oral and literate

Quote.Author: David Antin
Quote.QuoteValue: There are editing procedures for talks just as there are editing procedures in jazz improvisation

Quote.Author: David Antin
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard being a hostage in somebody else's mouth - or a character in somebody else's novel

Quote.Author: David Antin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm standing up thinking. Anybody who wants to listen is welcome. If not, I'm happy to see them go

Quote.Author: David Antin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not sure what theory is, unless it's the pursuit of fundamental questions

Quote.Author: David Antin
Quote.QuoteValue: I tended to emphasize the secular, the casual, the colloquial, the vernacular against the sacred

Quote.Author: David Antin
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned enough Hebrew to stagger through a meaningless ceremony that I scarcely remember

Quote.Author: David Antin
Quote.QuoteValue: I can manage a prose format as long as I keep closer to Laurence Sterne than to Henry James

Quote.Author: David Bergen
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure is essential. Trial and error is necessary

Quote.Author: David Bergen
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the novelist's job: to peel back the layers and look underneath

Quote.Author: David Bergen
Quote.QuoteValue: I always have a book that I use that somehow inspires my novels

Quote.Author: David Bergen
Quote.QuoteValue: As a writer, I'm always aware of the fact that there are so many books out there

Quote.Author: David Bergen
Quote.QuoteValue: You are only as good as your last book, and so there has to be a book

Quote.Author: David Bergen
Quote.QuoteValue: Every year, the Giller jury is different. You write the best book you can and throw it out there

Quote.Author: David Bergen
Quote.QuoteValue: I like characters who are contradictory

Quote.Author: David Bergen
Quote.QuoteValue: A mentor, a 'teacher,' is like an editor. I absolutely value my editor, who is my teacher

Quote.Author: David Bergen
Quote.QuoteValue: Books in general are great, but I'm a fiction lover, and I will continue to do it

Quote.Author: David Bergen
Quote.QuoteValue: The IMPAC is a terribly important award

Quote.Author: David Carradine
Quote.QuoteValue: If you cannot be a poet, be the poem

Quote.Author: David Carradine
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I've never actually really believed that death is inevitable. I just think it's a rumor

Quote.Author: David Carradine
Quote.QuoteValue: Most actors spend a lot of time training themselves to be an actor. And I kind of didn't do that

Quote.Author: David Carradine
Quote.QuoteValue: I was involved in a web cartoon of Kung Fu with WB a few years back

Quote.Author: David Carradine
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Born to play? Hmmm. Probably Romeo... or Hamlet, I guess. Also, I'd be a great Alexander the Great

Quote.Author: David Carradine
Quote.QuoteValue: I studied music formally. I was probably less formal about my study of acting than anything

Quote.Author: David Carradine
Quote.QuoteValue: Kung fu: You've got to spend your whole life at it before you're kung fu

Quote.Author: David Carradine
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm analytical as an actor, and one of the things Quentin did was free me from that

Quote.Author: David Carradine
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like a renegade and that rubs people wrong

Quote.Author: David Carradine
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always known whether I'm great. Or not

Quote.Author: David Caruso
Quote.QuoteValue: Red hair stigmatizes you

Quote.Author: David Caruso
Quote.QuoteValue: Television, as you know, can kind of jettison you into a whole new world

Quote.Author: David Caruso
Quote.QuoteValue: In Hollywood, if you have any success, you have this fear: What do you have to do to hang onto it?

Quote.Author: David Caruso
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned that unemployment can be the great educator

Quote.Author: David Caruso
Quote.QuoteValue: Any story you've heard of my behavior is probably true

Quote.Author: David Caruso
Quote.QuoteValue: My visibility may have gotten Hollywood to redefine what's attractive

Quote.Author: David Caruso
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are not totally nauseous after seeing me

Quote.Author: David Caruso
Quote.QuoteValue: Miami is one of the great cultural melting pots in the world. I love working and living here

Quote.Author: David Caruso
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not willing to risk, there are no rewards

Quote.Author: David Caruso
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a guy who abandoned a TV show. I didn't care about people

Quote.Author: David Coverdale
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't avoid confrontation, people should know that

Quote.Author: David Coverdale
Quote.QuoteValue: What anybody else thinks about you is really of no consequence. It's what you think of yourself

Quote.Author: David Coverdale
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, all my songs are relatives, brothers, sisters, cousins

Quote.Author: David Coverdale
Quote.QuoteValue: I take care of my voice; I'm working out the way I would do my body, so that stays in shape

Quote.Author: David Coverdale
Quote.QuoteValue: Artistic development is a thing of the past, sadly

Quote.Author: David Coverdale
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved music, very simply, as a vehicle to express myself and that hasn't changed

Quote.Author: David Coverdale
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always thought live albums were cop-outs

Quote.Author: David Coverdale
Quote.QuoteValue: My voice is an instrument

Quote.Author: David Coverdale
Quote.QuoteValue: Not necessarily, a lot of my songs are firmly tongue in cheek

Quote.Author: David Coverdale
Quote.QuoteValue: The only one I really like is a song called Saccharine

Quote.Author: David Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: As time goes by, I realize that I do trust the wind. And I often write my songs for myself

Quote.Author: David Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Songwriting is the most terrifying thing to me, because you are really laying your heart out there

Quote.Author: David Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: My first career was as a coach and a teacher

Quote.Author: David Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: When I got to Broadway, I conducted five Broadway shows

Quote.Author: David Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Composition is definitely what I'm born to do, and it came last

Quote.Author: David Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: My career keeps shifting; I keep doing the next thing and it keeps growing

Quote.Author: David Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to produce Nancy LaMott's albums, so I created my own record company

Quote.Author: David Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I fought for years and spent a fortune fighting and never got anywhere

Quote.Author: David Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been doing my big theater projects, which take years, and writing a song here and there

Quote.Author: David Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: It sometimes feels like I'm not doing anything

Quote.Author: David Frum
Quote.QuoteValue: Think tanks do have points of view, and they are absolutely entitled to defend them

Quote.Author: David Frum
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother cared more about how you reasoned than about the conclusions you reached

Quote.Author: David Frum
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody ever won an election by spitting at his political opponents

Quote.Author: David Frum
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing that sustains a strong Fox network is the thing that undermines a strong Republican party

Quote.Author: David Frum
Quote.QuoteValue: The elite isn't leading anymore. It's trapped

Quote.Author: David Frum
Quote.QuoteValue: People need to understand that in Washington, the process is the punishment

Quote.Author: David Frum
Quote.QuoteValue: In journalism I can only tell what happened. In fiction, I can show it

Quote.Author: David Frum
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no right to work in a think tank, and these are very privileged positions

Quote.Author: David Frum
Quote.QuoteValue: Why should we not expect self-designated environmental leaders to practice what they preach?

Quote.Author: David Frum
Quote.QuoteValue: Republicans originally thought that Fox worked for us and now we're discovering we work for Fox

Quote.Author: David Guetta
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to party in space because I make alien music

Quote.Author: David Guetta
Quote.QuoteValue: Our job as producers is to make the music sound as good as possible

Quote.Author: David Guetta
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, kids come to see me in the same way that their parents would go to see a rock concert

Quote.Author: David Guetta
Quote.QuoteValue: I headline concert halls for 20,000 people, but I still play smaller venues

Quote.Author: David Guetta
Quote.QuoteValue: Traveling all around the world, music sounds different

Quote.Author: David Guetta
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not limited

Quote.Author: David Guetta
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the type of person to live in fear. I think positively

Quote.Author: David Guetta
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanna be a nice guy

Quote.Author: David Guetta
Quote.QuoteValue: I mix up all styles on my albums because that is what music is about now

Quote.Author: David Guetta
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids listen to everything on the Internet

Quote.Author: David Ige
Quote.QuoteValue: We have more endangered species here in our islands than any other state in the country

Quote.Author: David Ige
Quote.QuoteValue: Any time and money spent on LNG is time and money not spent on renewable energy

Quote.Author: David Ige
Quote.QuoteValue: There were many in the party that did not want me to run

Quote.Author: David Ige
Quote.QuoteValue: We want the people of Japan to know that the people of Hawaii welcome them to the Hawaiian Islands

Quote.Author: David Ige
Quote.QuoteValue: Japan and Hawaii enjoy a special connection, and I want to honor this enduring relationship

Quote.Author: David Ige
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's really important as we position Hawaii as the policy leader in renewable energy

Quote.Author: David Ige
Quote.QuoteValue: LNG is a fossil fuel. LNG is imported

Quote.Author: David Ige
Quote.QuoteValue: I have reached the conclusion that Hawaii does not need LNG in our future

Quote.Author: David Ige
Quote.QuoteValue: It's time to focus all of our efforts on renewables. We will oppose the building of LNG facilities

Quote.Author: David Ige
Quote.QuoteValue: The voters of Hawaii have said loud and clear that it's not money that wins elections

Quote.Author: David Johansen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm doing exactly what I want to do, and I'm having fun doing it

Quote.Author: David Johansen
Quote.QuoteValue: I got arrested once on stage in Memphis for looking too much like Liza Minnelli

Quote.Author: David Johansen
Quote.QuoteValue: Playing music is the best thing in the world. It makes show business almost bearable

Quote.Author: David Johansen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really a drag to do the same project over and over again

Quote.Author: David Johansen
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was a Norwegian tenor and my mother a New York Irish librarian

Quote.Author: David Johansen
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm sleeping I do a lot of living

Quote.Author: David Johansen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not impersonating anybody. I'm perfectly satisfied with what I am

Quote.Author: David Johansen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been around the block a couple of times, and the guy I am now is the guy I like to be

Quote.Author: David Johansen
Quote.QuoteValue: I still do a lot of shows with Brian Koonin, but we haven't had a full band lately

Quote.Author: David Johansen
Quote.QuoteValue: The first Latin music that blew my mind was bumba, which was a Puerto Rican beat

Quote.Author: David Korten
Quote.QuoteValue: Global competition is about winners and losers

Quote.Author: David Korten
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is a mechanism for control

Quote.Author: David Korten
Quote.QuoteValue: My claim is that we do not have a market economy, but a capitalist economy

Quote.Author: David Korten
Quote.QuoteValue: It is interesting to note that the 200 richest people have more assets than the 2 billion poorest

Quote.Author: David Korten
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is not wealth. Money is a claim on wealth

Quote.Author: David Korten
Quote.QuoteValue: Wall Street sees a social fabric or social contract as inefficiencies, which need to be removed

Quote.Author: David Korten
Quote.QuoteValue: So, there is enormous instability in the global economy with a shift of winners and losers

Quote.Author: David Korten
Quote.QuoteValue: We should be moving toward local currencies not global or European currencies

Quote.Author: David Korten
Quote.QuoteValue: If I would need to make a prediction I still believe Kaplan's scenario is very plausible

Quote.Author: David Korten
Quote.QuoteValue: There are actually very few US politicians who have integrity and vision

Quote.Author: David L. Wolper
Quote.QuoteValue: Relax! Life is beautiful!

Quote.Author: David L. Wolper
Quote.QuoteValue: My main contribution has been that I have educated and entertained people at the same time

Quote.Author: David L. Wolper
Quote.QuoteValue: Continuity is a wonderful thing, and it is a very rare thing in show business

Quote.Author: David L. Wolper
Quote.QuoteValue: I can possibly say I have entertained and educated more people than anyone else in the world

Quote.Author: David L. Wolper
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a fine line between patriotism and corn

Quote.Author: David L. Wolper
Quote.QuoteValue: If people perceive 'Roots' to be a black history show, nobody is going to watch it

Quote.Author: David L. Wolper
Quote.QuoteValue: My roots are documentaries

Quote.Author: David L. Wolper
Quote.QuoteValue: I was the first independent to walk in with a documentary

Quote.Author: David L. Wolper
Quote.QuoteValue: The minute I went into business, I was a success, and I've done well ever since

Quote.Author: David L. Wolper
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't call four hours a miniseries

Quote.Author: David Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: We have one life and we should cherish it and make it the best we can

Quote.Author: David Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always good to find out what you don't want to do

Quote.Author: David Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are an actor, rejection and disappointment are an occupational hazard

Quote.Author: David Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: Liverpool will always be my home

Quote.Author: David Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to act because I can forget about everything else

Quote.Author: David Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm quite a lazy person, actually. If I'm not careful, I could just stay in bed all day

Quote.Author: David Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: My son got me into 'The Mighty Boosh.' I just love that surrealist humour

Quote.Author: David Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing as an actor is you get a sense of what a show is like the minute you walk on the set

Quote.Author: David Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd really like to get on a Greyhound bus and go backpacking across America

Quote.Author: David Morrissey
Quote.QuoteValue: I've moved into directing as well as acting, and it has taught me never to take casting personally

Quote.Author: David Neeleman
Quote.QuoteValue: What you can't buy is the loyalty that comes through our dedicated crewmembers

Quote.Author: David Neeleman
Quote.QuoteValue: We're reviewing everything to see how we can do it better, faster, and more efficiently

Quote.Author: David Neeleman
Quote.QuoteValue: Just keep thinking about the good side of ADD - the creativity and the originality it can stimulate

Quote.Author: David Neeleman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always crunching numbers, so my calculator watch is a must

Quote.Author: David Neeleman
Quote.QuoteValue: And, of course, customers really need to feel safe and are seeking reassurance when they fly

Quote.Author: David Neeleman
Quote.QuoteValue: Value will always be on top of everyone's lists now, right along with safety

Quote.Author: David Neeleman
Quote.QuoteValue: This is not a business where you can hand off and run by remote control

Quote.Author: David Neeleman
Quote.QuoteValue: I also really like getting to know our crew members better

Quote.Author: David Neeleman
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually thrive on all the challenges, and I don't feel like ADD has impaired my ability

Quote.Author: David Neeleman
Quote.QuoteValue: Certainly, we are hurt by the high fuel prices because it raises our cost

Quote.Author: David Ogden Stiers
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a couple of roles I haven't played that I want to. I would love to play Shiloh

Quote.Author: David Ogden Stiers
Quote.QuoteValue: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten

Quote.Author: David Ogden Stiers
Quote.QuoteValue: In television you go in with this operating system that it is a crapshoot

Quote.Author: David Ogden Stiers
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot affects the outcome. It boils down to scheduling and the commitment of the network

Quote.Author: David Ogden Stiers
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd forgotten I'd done the anime called Spirited Away, the English version of a Japanese film

Quote.Author: David Ogden Stiers
Quote.QuoteValue: We lament the speed of our society and the lack of depth and the nature of disposable information

Quote.Author: David Ogden Stiers
Quote.QuoteValue: High school music teachers... nobody makes a living off it

Quote.Author: David Ogden Stiers
Quote.QuoteValue: I will never master this craft. Orchestras are very, very forthcoming with me

Quote.Author: David Ogden Stiers
Quote.QuoteValue: I am certainly not a mainstream religious man

Quote.Author: David Ogden Stiers
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really important to stay engaged and involved in the character

Quote.Author: David Prowse
Quote.QuoteValue: Training has been such a huge part of my life and career I hope to keep going with it

Quote.Author: David Prowse
Quote.QuoteValue: I've seen the teaser trailer for Revenge of the Sith though and I think it will be excellent

Quote.Author: David Prowse
Quote.QuoteValue: My agent set up a meeting with George Lucas. They were casting in England

Quote.Author: David Prowse
Quote.QuoteValue: I suppose the most fun I had was on the second film

Quote.Author: David Prowse
Quote.QuoteValue: But I must say the work I'm proudest of is the Green Cross Code man

Quote.Author: David Prowse
Quote.QuoteValue: I am doing better now though one of my legs is shorter than the other due to the operations

Quote.Author: David Prowse
Quote.QuoteValue: As a director he was not that interested in Vader

Quote.Author: David Prowse
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually I'm not that involved in the fan site

Quote.Author: David Prowse
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually, the Department of Transport were at one stage going to sack me

Quote.Author: David Prowse
Quote.QuoteValue: Not much to be perfectly honest! I thought The Phantom Menace was terrible, except for the Pod Race

Quote.Author: David Steinberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Silences are the most underrated part of comedy

Quote.Author: David Steinberg
Quote.QuoteValue: And it was a huge emotional thing to leave the law and become unemployed - to be a student again

Quote.Author: David Steinberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I rewrote it and I took all your notes. Read it again, that kind of persistence paid off

Quote.Author: David Steinberg
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was a rabbi and had a little synagogue in Canada, so I'm from Canada. I left there at 16

Quote.Author: David Steinberg
Quote.QuoteValue: When I started, you didn't make a lot of money by being a comedian. You didn't get a lot of respect

Quote.Author: David Steinberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedians talk to other comedians the way jazz musicians can talk to each other

Quote.Author: David Steinberg
Quote.QuoteValue: A spontaneous interview feels differently than anything else you see on television

Quote.Author: David Steinberg
Quote.QuoteValue: We were the guys on the other side. It was hilarious

Quote.Author: David Steinberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a lawyer in New York sucks because you're working eighty, sometimes a hundred hours a week

Quote.Author: David Steinberg
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need to be stable to be a stand-up comedian

Quote.Author: David Wilkerson
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do

Quote.Author: David Wilkerson
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in walking in the Spirit

Quote.Author: David Wilkerson
Quote.QuoteValue: God has never, in the history of mankind, allowed his name to go long offended

Quote.Author: David Wilkerson
Quote.QuoteValue: My oldest son, Gary, is a seasoned minister and travels with me for ministers' conferences

Quote.Author: David Wilkerson
Quote.QuoteValue: In these times, God's people must trust him for rest of body and soul

Quote.Author: David Wilkerson
Quote.QuoteValue: Eighteen years ago, the Holy Spirit led me to establish a church in the heart of Times Square

Quote.Author: David Wilkerson
Quote.QuoteValue: Both of our daughters, Debbie and Bonnie, are also cancer survivors

Quote.Author: David Wilkerson
Quote.QuoteValue: Christ died to save this lost world; he did not come to destroy, maim or pour out wrath

Quote.Author: David Wilkerson
Quote.QuoteValue: Our ministry is debt free and we have not had to beg or plead for finances

Quote.Author: David Wilkerson
Quote.QuoteValue: From the beginning, this has been a faith-based ministry

Quote.Author: Davy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever I go, people still shout out: 'Hey, hey, we're The Monkees.' And I never tire of that

Quote.Author: Davy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing is, the reader doesn't want to hear about bad times

Quote.Author: Davy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Justin Bieber stole my haircut. And Axl Rose stole my dance!

Quote.Author: Davy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: The Monkees changed my life but ruined my acting career

Quote.Author: Davy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: The racing bug is never going to go away. It's like the Mafia

Quote.Author: Davy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: You know I used to be a heartthrob, and now I'm a coronary

Quote.Author: Davy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: The Monkees are like the mafia. You're in for life. Nobody gets out

Quote.Author: Davy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I was mad at Screen Gems, but I'm not mad at them anymore

Quote.Author: Davy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: My family is a part of my life and everything is all a mixture of enjoyment

Quote.Author: Davy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as groupies, I never saw any of them

Quote.Author: Dean Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no fear that the candle lighted in Palestine years ago will ever be put out

Quote.Author: Dean Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: What is originality? Undetected plagiarism

Quote.Author: Dean Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: The soul is dyed with the color of its leisure thoughts

Quote.Author: Dean Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: Let none of us delude himself by supposing that honesty is always the best policy. It is not

Quote.Author: Dean Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: Gambling is a disease of barbarians superficially civilized

Quote.Author: Dean Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: The wisdom of the wise is an uncommon degree of common sense

Quote.Author: Dean Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't get up from the feast of life without paying for your share of it

Quote.Author: Dean Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: The wise man is he who knows the relative value of things

Quote.Author: Dean Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: We tolerate shapes in human beings that would horrify us if we saw them in a horse

Quote.Author: Dean Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: A good government remains the greatest of human blessings and no nation has ever enjoyed it

Quote.Author: DeAngelo Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: When breast cancer took my mom, it met its biggest enemy

Quote.Author: DeAngelo Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Pink is not a color - it's a culture to me

Quote.Author: DeAngelo Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Speak your mind; you don't have to be PC

Quote.Author: DeAngelo Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up knowing the importance of breast cancer

Quote.Author: DeAngelo Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom was the strongest woman I know

Quote.Author: DeAngelo Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I want everyone to know there is always someone there for you

Quote.Author: DeAngelo Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Nickelback guy

Quote.Author: DeAngelo Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: As a football team, we don't have any backups. We don't consider anybody a backup

Quote.Author: DeAngelo Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up watching wrestling

Quote.Author: DeAngelo Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a lot of people who don't know what metastatic breast cancer is

Quote.Author: Deb Caletti
Quote.QuoteValue: I would eat fruitcake if there'd been a nuclear war and I'd run out of canned goods

Quote.Author: Deb Caletti
Quote.QuoteValue: When you go looking for rescue, you end up trapped in your own weakness

Quote.Author: Deb Caletti
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes good choices are really bad ones, wrapped up in so much fear you can't even see straight

Quote.Author: Deb Caletti
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never met a popcorn ball I didn't like

Quote.Author: Deb Caletti
Quote.QuoteValue: Like all kids with divorced parents, I have an abundance of holidays

Quote.Author: Deb Caletti
Quote.QuoteValue: You never know how - or when - the idea for a book will appear

Quote.Author: Deb Caletti
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the most constant and sustaining truths of my life has been this: I love the library

Quote.Author: Deb Caletti
Quote.QuoteValue: I long for books; I am utterly greedy about them

Quote.Author: Deb Caletti
Quote.QuoteValue: I became a writer because I love books, and I believe in their power

Quote.Author: Deb Caletti
Quote.QuoteValue: My dream was, and always had been, to write a book. To be a writer

Quote.Author: Debbie Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always moving forward

Quote.Author: Debbie Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's kind of dangerous to cut in the camera, but that's the only way I know how to direct

Quote.Author: Debbie Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: In scoring we have a lot that was not evident in the shooting. The radio is on all the time

Quote.Author: Debbie Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: But out of limitations comes creativity

Quote.Author: Debbie Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Michael Ralph brilliantly plays the street prophet, a West Indian who foreshadows the Harlem riot

Quote.Author: Debbie Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Time management is a big part of the director's job

Quote.Author: Debbie Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest challenge was that we had to shoot so quickly and with such a limited budget

Quote.Author: Debbie Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything has to be well thought out - what do you really need, when can you do with less coverage

Quote.Author: Debbie Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: A director just pushes them a little this way or that way

Quote.Author: Debbie Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: But it was not possible to do this movie, in this matter of time, without a solid rehearsal period

Quote.Author: Dee Dee Ramone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to congratulate myself, and thank myself, and give myself a big pat on the back

Quote.Author: Dee Dee Ramone
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't done rap... I can't do that too well

Quote.Author: Dee Dee Ramone
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't do rap. I was trying. I don't know how. I'm not good enough to know

Quote.Author: Dee Dee Ramone
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it would be nice to be a prince

Quote.Author: Dee Dee Ramone
Quote.QuoteValue: I like California a lot more than New York these days

Quote.Author: Dee Dee Ramone
Quote.QuoteValue: Metallica - they're so demonic, they're crazy, I don't know how they do it

Quote.Author: Dee Dee Ramone
Quote.QuoteValue: Ricky Nelson... I couldn't believe it when he died. He was a great rock star

Quote.Author: Dee Dee Ramone
Quote.QuoteValue: We didn't do an American tour because it I know it wouldn't go down well

Quote.Author: Dee Dee Ramone
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to be a hairdresser

Quote.Author: Dee Dee Ramone
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very expensive to bring a band to New York
